page.title: 09New Housing-Robert's Lodge 2
page.content: {A Representative Survey 32/82 { {Q.}Is there a good bus service? {A.}No. {Q.}Have you got a car? {A.}(17) homes have a car. {Q.}Have you got a computer,video, stereo,television,telephone? {A.}Computer (4) homes. Video (17) homes. Stereo (24) homes. Television (32) homes. Telephone (23) homes. {Q.}What do you do in your spare time? {A. Males.}Sports.Gardening.Reading. Repairs bicycles.Wine maker.Watches Speedway racing. {Females.} Reading.Gardening.Sewing. Indoor bowling.Decorating.Going to church.Knitting.Watching television. Disco dancing.Aerobics.Swimming. Walking.Visiting.Helping people.
